body_html: On a Threadripper quad-GPU box with 1080ti's turning off IOMMU replaces a hang with a particularly brutal and immediate crash as soon as the first batches hit the GPU, and GPU fans spin up to 100% and stay there. That's progress, but not quite all the way to where I need to be.
body_text: On a Threadripper quad-GPU box with 1080ti's turning off IOMMU replaces a hang with a particularly brutal and immediate crash as soon as the first batches hit the GPU, and GPU fans spin up to 100% and stay there. That's progress, but not quite all the way to where I need to be.
body: On a Threadripper quad-GPU box with 1080ti's turning off IOMMU replaces a hang with a particularly brutal and immediate crash as soon as the first batches hit the GPU, and GPU fans spin up to 100% and stay there. That's progress, but not quite all the way to where I need to be.
